summary: [Spoilers] Does anyone else want an alternate Season 1, where Ned follows Littlefinger's plan?
title: [Spoilers] Does anyone else want an alternate Season 1, where Ned follows Littlefinger's plan?
body:
I am rewatching the show, and I’m at episode 7 now, where Littlefinger suggests Ned takes the power for himself, as he is hand of the king and regent. Of course, in the end, Ned wanted to install Stannis on the throne, but I’d really like to see Ned and Littlefinger work together in a sort of “alternate history”.

Obviously I know it’s not going to happen, but I think it would’ve been pretty cool.



Source: https://ift.tt/2sjQkW6

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: Two queen’s men brought forth the Horn of Joramun, black and banded with old gold, eight feet long from end to end.Runes were...
body:
Two queen’s men brought forth the Horn of Joramun, black and banded with old gold, eight feet long from end to end.

Runes were carved into the golden bands, the writing of the First Men.

George R.R. Martin | A Dance With Dragons Part One: Dreams and Dust

reblog.comment:

blog.name: sketchasoiaf
blog.title: A Sketch of Ice and Fire
blog.description:
My name is Noa and I'm re-reading and drawing each chapter of a Song of Ice and Fire. Updated 3 times a week.

Contact me at noa@null.co.il | Main art tumblr: http://noalp.tumblr.com | My Patreon

View by Character POV: Jon | Tyrion | Daenerys | Ned | Catelyn | Arya | Sansa | Bran | Theon | Davos | Jaime

blog.name: florineandthebluebird
blog.title: Fanfic writer in Amsterdam, follow my work on AO3
blog.description: Petyr X Sansa fics, posts as Haroldsaxon on AO3, Aidan Gillen is my muse, don't like don't read!

summary:
Fickle Games (Mock(ing)bird part II): A redemption fic in which Petyr finds himself punished by the 
Gods and was sent to...
caption:
Fickle Games (Mock(ing)bird part II): A redemption fic in which Petyr finds himself punished by the Gods and was sent to purgatory to suffer without his wits and memory of his past self for centuries. He is left at the mercy of Ramsay Bolton as an inmate in an insane asylum. Meanwhile, Sansa Stark has a new life in our plane of existence, but is determined to save Petyr’s condemned soul from purgatory.

This post: Sansa & Petyr are finally reunited. Start reading from the beginning, or follow me here

blog.name: introvertedassh0le
blog.title: Uhhh, an Art Blog ?
blog.description:
A highly introverted, insecure, clumsy, broke ass, self claimed artist with long periods of artist's block, procrastination and depression, followed by occasional bursts of creativity and enthusiasm ( and cravings for fries ) which lasts for approximately a week... 
❤
Searching for self-esteem in the form of followers, nice comments and honest criticism of my art... (+_+)

summary: This one was drawn when I was watching Season 7 of Game of Thrones lmao. I think I drew it using a reference. Most of the time...
caption: This one was drawn when I was watching Season 7 of Game of Thrones lmao. I think I drew it using a reference. Most of the time when I draw something, I use the main framework of a reference picture and draw the details myself. I’m pretty impressed with the details on this one.

blog.name: jonsasnow
blog.title: jonsasnow
blog.description: mostly just game of thrones and kpop + icon by akairingo06 on twitter/theartofjum on instagram + header by artofemmanation

summary: GOT
question: GOT
answer:
You’re the only person who sent me a fandom lmao XD Thank you! 

  • THE CHARACTER I LEAST UNDERSTAND:
    • Probably Stannis. I just don’t understand how someone who seems so rigid with the laws of the land could be so swayed by a fire priestess, enough to kill his child, whom I know he loved to some extent. 

  • INTERACTIONS I ENJOYED THE MOST
    • Would I be a Jonsa shipper if I didn’t say Jon and Sansa? Because I mean… c’mon. S6 was glorious. I hadn’t expected it at all. From the heartfelt reunion to the blatant eye-fucking and the romantic/sexual undertones. It was insane. 

  • THE CHARACTER WHO SCARES ME THE MOST
    • Ramsay. Without a doubt. He did awful and terrible things that made me deeply uncomfortable. There were scenes in S5 that I couldn’t bring myself to watch because I had such a visceral reaction to it. He’s literally the worst. 
       
  • THE CHARACTER WHO IS MOSTLY LIKE ME
    • I think I’m honestly most like Arya. By my very nature, I’m headstrong, stubborn, impulsive and if anyone were to hurt me or my loved ones, I’d vindictively train and plan my vengeance. I hold grudges. 

  • HOTTEST LOOKING CHARACTER
    • Robb Stark. With that face and that accent? Yeah, sign me the fuck up. 

  • ONE THING I DISLIKE ABOUT MY FAVE CHARACTER
    • I think Sansa has a tendency to shut people out and act cold, hiding her true intentions, whether they’re honourable or not. It’s not that I don’t understand why she does it or what led her to become like this, but it’s more so that I wish Sansa had a chance to really explore her trauma and learn healthier ways to cope. 

  • ONE THING I LIKE ABOUT MY HATED CHARACTER
    • Not hated (despite what people think) but I love D’s aggression. I love how she went from the timid child she was in the beginning to this woman who takes whatever she wants whenever she wants. I love that aggression. It’s really fascinating to watch how it’s escalated over the seasons. 

  • A QUOTE OR SCENE THAT HAUNTS ME
    • To be perfectly honest with you guys, I don’t cry easily, especially for shows, books or movies. Or anything tbh. But the one scene in Game of Thrones that really fucking shook me to the core was Hodor’s final scene and the flashback/vision Bran had about what happened to him. I was honestly heartbroken. I mean there were plenty of moments in the show that was painful, but this really tore me up inside. 

  • A DEATH THAT LEFT ME INDIFFERENT
    • Stannis? I just didn’t really care. 

  • A CHARACTER I WISH DIED BUT DIDN’T
    • I guess I’d say D because I think she should die and I think she will die. 

  • MY SHIP THAT NEVER SAILED
    • Since the show isn’t over yet, we don’t know, but the ships that need to be canon are: Jonsa, Braime and Gendrya. Thank you and good day.

+ Send me a fandom +

  • MY SHIP THAT NEVER SAILED
    • Since the show isn’t over yet, we don’t know, but the ships that need to be canon are: Jonsa, Braime and Gendrya. Thank you and good day.

+ Send me a fandom +

summary: [No Spoilers] Gendry is the rightful heir to Bobby B, not Stannis
title: [No Spoilers] Gendry is the rightful heir to Bobby B, not Stannis
body:
In S1E2, Cerci tells Catelin that she had a baby boy with brown hair who died when he was little. In S1E4 Gendry tells Ned his mom had yellow hair and she died when he was little. Instead of being Robert’s bastard like Ned had thought (because he never knew of the baby boy with brown hair - Catelin specifically says she never knew), Gendry is Robert’s first born son and heir. Cerci couldn’t stand the baby because it looked like Bobby B, but she still loves her children so she gave it away and told everyone he died of an illness.



Source: https://ift.tt/2J0NPCw
